Aux:TextAnnotations.Aux:document_text: The People's Government of Shenzhen approved the contract on 15 February, 1988 and the State Administration for Industry and Commerce issued the business license on 11 March, 1988. The joint venture company was established.Afterwards, the two parties had disputes over the operation, the claimant submitted to the arbitration CIETAC Shenzhen for arbitration thereafter. The claimant claimed in his application as follows: To terminate the contract between the claimant and the respondent and liquidate both parties' credits and debts. To confirm the investment of HKD 638,297.87 of the claimant, and these investments in cash and equipment should be turned back to the claimant. The respondent should compensate the claimant's economic loss owing to the respondent's breach of contract. Regarding to the claims aforesaid, the claimant stated that the respondent had excluded the claimant of management of the factory after 4 months from establishment of the factory. The claimant had inquired the respondent about the situation of operation and management of the factory for many times and required to provide the verification of capital and financial reports of the factory which were both denied by the respondent in the excuse of "not existed". The respondent still concealed the claimant after the Shenzhen account firm verified the capital of both parties and made the verification report. The board meeting of the joint venture company had decided to suspend production on 17 August, 1988 while the respondent started to produce unilaterally without a notice to the claimant
